title: Ponies of Miklaengi
creator_credit: Phoenix Films, Daniel Smith and Gary Templeton
brief_description: Situated in Iceland, two youngsters round up sheep on their horses, eat and sing with the family and search for three lost sheep, all amongst beautiful scenery.
creator_credit_for_label: Phoenix Films, Daniel Smith and Gary Templeton
